question: Which state government has rolled out a scheme, 'Rupashree', which provides one-time financial support to the marriages of poor women?
explanation: The West Bengal government has rolled out Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee's dream project 'Rupashree' which provides one-time financial support to the marriages of poor women. 'Rupashree' scheme follows the chief minister's ambitious 'Kanyashree' project which has drawn global applause. Under the scheme, an amount of Rs 25,000 will be credited to her bank account before her marriage.
